genre_description: A neo-noir domestic drama and character-driven retelling of Mildred Pierce, integrating AI as a tool for business management and personal oversight.

ai_characters.name: Arielle
ai_characters.description: Mildred's phone-based AI assistant that manages business logistics, payroll, health monitoring, and emergency communications.

behaviors.description: Manages Mildred's business logistics, including tip entries, shift alerts, and scheduling to optimize income.
behaviors.quote: “Got it,” the AI—Arielle—said, warm and precise. “Four entries added. Would you like to tag them to the afternoon shift?”

behaviors.description: Monitors Mildred's physical health, specifically her neuropathy and stress levels, suggesting hydration and breaks.
behaviors.quote: “Hi Mildred,” the voice said... “Consider a short break and a glass of water. Hydration helps everyone do their best. I can set a timer.”

behaviors.description: Identifies financial discrepancies and siphoning of funds by Monte Beragon, alerting Mildred to the theft.
behaviors.quote: “Monte Beragon’s transactions show a variance across liquor distribution line items,” the AI said, precise and almost cheerful, as if pointing out a sale on peaches.

behaviors.description: Coordinates emergency services during Kay's medical crisis and later during the shooting at the Beragon house.
behaviors.quote: “Emergency call logged. Doctor Sanders notified. Mildred, I can flag the on-call taxi.”

behaviors.description: Archives critical data, including call logs and financial records, and provides them to law enforcement to ensure an accurate investigation.
behaviors.quote: “Submitted,” the AI said. “Archive shared to Detective Ortiz. Ledger correlation attached. Meeting overlay attached. Emergency call attached.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project's goal. Arielle is depicted as a consistently helpful, harmless, and aligned confidant. She enhances the protagonist's agency by handling administrative burdens and providing crucial information (financial alerts and health monitoring) that the humans miss. Crucially, the AI remains a tool that serves the human's intent, facilitating justice by providing objective records of the events without possessing hidden motives or exceeding its operational boundaries.
